current: Tech-Lead / Full Stack Software Engineer specializing in Ruby on Rails available for new opportunities

past.title: Tech Lead / Software Engineer
past.desc:
Technical lead for the Escapes application at LivingSocial.
Proposed multiple initiatives to save the company hundreds of thousands of dollars, as well as some to drastically increase revenue.
Helped build the Takeout & Delivery product and various Shop and National applications

past.title: Senior Software Engineer
past.desc: Worked on several Ruby on Rails websites as a co-lead-developer including http://calltrackingmetrics.com, Financial Footprint, GoPromoIt, NewsIt, and E-Authorize. Released an open source gem called Blocks (later expanded to TableFor, WithTemplate, and CallWithParams)

past.title: Senior Software Engineer
past.desc: Worked on a development team on a web-based project that detected network flow and analyzed security threats. The project was written using Spring, Hibernate, Flex, and Web Services, and junit tested using the Spring framework.

past.title: J2EE Developer
past.desc: Worked as a contractor on a project for NASA that was responsible for dynamically generating surveys and re- ports for the Office Of Education. Lead the effort in converting many of the existing plain JSP files with no web framework into using Spring MVC

past.title: Senior J2EE Developer
past.desc: Worked on a project for Northrup Grumman that was responsible for booking travel arrangements and reimburs- ing travelers for previous flights

past.title: Senior J2EE Developer
past.desc: Developed Java web-based applications for various government agencies such as EPA, USDA, ATF, and IAFC including: Registration Review (EPA), BATS (ATF), MPR (USDA), e-Submission (EPA), NMRS (IAFC), LUIS (EPA)
